song.title: Waiting Here For You
song.lyrics:
[1] . D If faith can move the mountains, .Bm7 A let the mountains move || . D We come with expectation, . Bm7 A G7 G We are waiting here for You . D Bm7 A Waiting here for You
[C] . D Em7 Waiting here for You, with our hands . Bm7 A G7 G Lifted hi - gh in praise || . D Em7 It is You, we adore . Bm7 A Bm7 A Singing Al - le - lu - ia
--- [2] . D You’re the Lord of all creation . Bm7 A and still You know my heart || . D You’re the author of salvation, . Bm7 A G7 G You’ve loved us from the start
[3] . D You are everything You’ve promised, . Bm7 A Your faithfulness is true || . D When we’re desperate for Your presence .Bm7 A G7 G All we need is You
[B] . G Bm7 A Singing Al-le-lu -ia 4x
